post.summary: DSS Apply Layout to Documents of a Package
post.description:
This utility enables users to apply a document layout to multiple documents within a package. E.g. a scenario wherein multiple SF30 forms (50+) submitted by the users are to be signed by the GSA official. The user creates the package by uploading the forms and the signer information. The user uses the Document Layout Utility to 'apply the layout' to all the 50+ forms and sends it out for signing. 
 Using this utility saves the user multiple clicks and manual time consuming process of applying the document to each of the documents. 
 The API is provisioned as a RESTful service and uses JSON as the data interchange format. You can use the example JSON from here as input body payload: 
 https://gsa.github.io/DSSAPIDocumentation/api-docs/applyLayout/applyLayoutExample.json 
 
 
 To find more info about the various errors and messages in DSS API's, read: 
 https://gsa.github.io/DSSAPIDocumentation/api-docs/createPackageErrors.html

ID.description: Generated unique identifier for te package.
